title: Go Taylor's Boyfriend | Funny Football Fan Shirt
description: Printed in the USA; screen printed in the state of Texas using our high quality silk screen process to ensure all printed designs last and never fade unlike others or competitors using cheap imported vinyl decals that crack and peel over time

High quality fabric; ringspun cotton that is preshrunk and ready to wear; our shirts are made to last a lifetime using ultra soft ringspun fabric giving it an incredibly lightweight, soft, and comfortable feel that will not shrink with age; our 4½ ounce per square yard ringspun cotton is stronger than cheap heavy cotton even at lighter weight because of the way the fibers are woven

Athletic slim fit tee shirt that contours to your body without giving that unflattering, boxy look of stiff heavy shirts from the 90s and never has that uncomfortably tight, starchy feel around the neckline; make sure to order a size up if you prefer a looser fit Unisex and can be worn by men or women.

Perfect gift idea for any special person in your life, him or her; our gridiron inspired Go Taylor's Boyfriend is an excellent gift if you are looking for something funny and personalized for your mom or dad, husband or wife, best friend, or even yourself
For the perfect fit see size chart in images; those are the dimensions of the garment when laid flat; lay your favorite shirt down flat and measure to find what size will fit you best
